transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Yes sir.

Customer: Haan? Hello? Sir Durgesh bol raha hu.

Executive: Haan bolo.

Customer: Haan sir dekho mai phone isliye kar raha tha sir aisa nahi aap phone karne hum bhi to aapko phone karke bol rahe hai na business kyu nahi de rahe ho humare ko?

Executive: Sir business aayega nahi hum bhi to bolenge na aapko.

Customer: Sir aapne liya hai aap sir aisa thodi hai aap isko aap teen saal ke aapne liya hai services.

Executive: Are sir tum meri baat suno maine nahi meri baat to suno aap pehli baar India mart me thodi chuna hu mai mai chuna pehli baar chuna jab to line bante se banegi already meri to line bani hui hai na.

Customer: Sir aapka acha aap batao support aap mai kya support aapne bola ki Durgesh mai sir aapke support aapke supported ke liye meri baat suno aap supported aapke supported ke liye nahi complaint kar raha hu mai mai kar raha hu mere ko business milne se related supported.

Executive: Haan sir mil jayega business mil jayega sir mil jayega koi dikkat nahi.

Customer: Bhai mai mai aapko ye bol raha hu mai aapko ye complaint nahi kar raha hu aap mera phone nahi utha rahe hai mere koi profile me wo nahi kar raha hu bhai aap check kar rahe ho aapke andar me hai to kam se kam mere ko business to milna chahiye mai ye cheez bol raha hu aapko.

Executive: Haan haan to wahi cheez mai bol raha hu sir ki business mil jayega koi mai service ke liye baitha hu sir aur kuch nahi aata hai mai hu aapke liye uske liye aap don't worry aap please denge aapko starting me bhi yahi bola tha sir ji market down hai humare liye bhi thodi problem hai bola nahi bola maine aapko starting me hi bola nahi hai baat.

Customer: Sir to maine dekho maine to aapko wo kiya na ki sir aap aapne bola ki Durgesh mai ek baar bhi nahi paisa sir ji nahi aap jo bol rahe hai sir ji are sir ji teen saal ka nahi abhi present apne ghar me aaj ka ration nahi hai teen saal baad me ek mahine ke baad kal parso ek hafte baad me to apne paas me ek saal ka a jayega par aaj ka ration nahi hai to kahenge kya apan.

Executive: I know I know sir mai us cheez ke liye us cheez ke liye bol raha hu mai aapko.

Customer: Haan I know sir aapne itna haan bataiye.

Executive: Bhai hum bataiye to bolenge paisa aapki company ko de rahe hai aap company ke wo hai to hum aap hi ko to bolenge bhai business kyu nahi de rahe ho humare ko.

Executive: Sir sir abhi dekhiye abhi aapka kya as as of now aapne abhi prefer leader liya kyu liya business growth karne ke liye liya na sir aur abhi just live hua hai aapko ye bataya ki aapne khud bola ki customer of quality increase hua hai to sir aisa thodi hai jyada thodi hai ki ek din me aapka turant business to uske liye time dena padta hai sir sari cheeze aapka aapko maine sara isko listing bhi dikha diya sir aapka mai ye to nahi mai nahi jaise mera arrangement baith raha hai bhai time dena padega business ke liye to mai bhi to arrange kar raha hu na aapko ye thodi hai bilkul pada ke baas ka diya maine jaise mera arrange ho raha hai to mai aapko kar raha hu na.

Executive: Haan haan aap kar rahe hai mai mai mai bilkul support kar raha hu lekin sir humara bhi ek daara hota hai hum bhi company ke according kaam karte hai jo hum performance laate hai aapka company ke according aapko bol raha hu mai suno meri baat mai bhi aapko company ke according hi bol raha hu aise nahi hai ki mai aapko kuch personally bol raha hu.

Customer: Hmm hmm hmm.

Executive: Mai personally aapko nahi personally aapko thodi paisa de raha hu jo mai aapko bolunga.

Customer: Hmm bilkul sir.

Executive: Aap bhai aapke account me aapki pocket me thodi ja raha hai jo mai personally aapko bolunga aapke senior hai unse baat karaiye na maine aap nahi aapke senior hai to unse.

Customer: Bilkul sir ji humara bolne ka adhikar hai hum keh sakte hai aapke junior ko senior ko bilkul bolenge humko business kyu nahi hai jab itna bada package liya hai ek mahine me thoda ek lakh ka nahi hai humara.

Executive: Sir to aa jayega na uske liye aa jayega uske liye don't worry sir uske liye don't worry aap mai baitha hu mai wali baat hu aapka support ke liye aapke support ke liye hum hai aur business hum aapko mil jayega aisa thodi hai ki nahi milega sir kyu liye hai isliye na ki business growth ho jaye humara top pe hai to humara naam ho jaye aap bhi liye isliye liye hai ki market me mera naam ho mera business ho meri baat suno mai wo aap jo bol rahe hai usme sab me sehmat hu.

Customer: Hmm hmm.

Executive: Aap jo bol rahe hai uske liye mai sehmat hu par humari bhi to bhai majburi hai na kam se kam bhai hum paisa dekho hum bhi investment karne se pehle sochna padta hai aur acha dusri baat abhi market nahi abhi market ki jo position chal rahi hai us market ki ki position ke according hi hum aapko bol rahe hai yaar hum paisa kaise laye abhi charo taraf market wo hai hum bhi to usi ke.

Executive: Koi baat nahi sir dekhiye aapne aap bhi aap bhi kiye hai aisa nahi hai but mai aapko ek cheez jarur batata hu abhi aapka 20949 bacha hua hai right aapko pata hai sir wo bacha hua hai sir mere ko dimag me aap iske liye to call hi mat kariye.

Customer: Mere ko iske liye mere paas pura complete nahi hai mai accountant khud hu mere meri company ka mai khud accountant hu mere ko jana kisko kitna dena hai kitna de diya hai kitna baki hai mere mere dimag me har cheez har cheez rehti hai aisa nahi hai.

Executive: Haan haan koi baat nahi sir waise kab tak ho jayega ye 20000 baki to wo to agle mahine me hai lekin is jo abhi bacha hua hai 20949 wo kab tak ho jayega sir aap bata do mai dobara phone nahi karunga aap ek bata do Durgesh is time me ho jayega hum bhi aapko support kar rahe hai sir.

Executive: Hello?

Customer: Haan ji haan haan aa raha hai time 30 tak kar dunga mai ho sakta hai aaj bhi kar sakta hu kal bhi kar sakta hu mai do din me kar dunga mai kar dunga jaise jaise halat hai na mai kar raha hu aapko aapko phone kar karo phone nahi karoge tab bhi mere liye wahi baat hai nahi karoge tab bhi mere liye wahi baat hai.

Customer: Okay chota amount nahi hai sir 20949.

Executive: Balance ke liye nahi ja sakta hai.

Customer: Hmm.

Executive: Balance kya hai nahi nahi main aapko.

Customer: Okay okay koi baat nahi.

Executive: Sir ji maine bataya na aapko humare aaj tariikh wariikh wo program hai.

Customer: Theek hai sir koi baat nahi.

Executive: Theek hai.

Customer: Theek hai sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer not getting enough business.

- Wants to know when refund will be processed.



Resolution:

- Executive assured business will improve.

- Executive will process refund by the 30th.



Next Steps: 

None



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, subscription, business, support
